ygData.messageBody:
LOL, this is indeed how the whole issue will end up. But I really believe that
the Bards should have bind mindset is outdated, and based solely on Beta/Early
Final Bard classification as Hybrids. If clerics were called Hybrids from the
beginning, there would be the same resistance to adding it, claiming balance
issues. Since they were called casters, no issue.

Golias, Sol Ro

-----------------------------
From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>

You've convinced me. From this day on, Bards shall be classified as
casters. And Bards shall be the only caster without Bind.
